node.name: Job-Portal
node.description: A web application built using MERN-stack implements a simplified Job-application Portal where-in the recruiter can select from different candidates and similarly applicant can apply to multiple jobs. Further details can be found in the assignment pdf.

node.name: MaskNet-with-Social-Distancing
node.description: Real time mask detection with social distancing

node.name: Roblox-GesturePlayer
node.description: The application uses Pose Detection to play games on Roblox

node.name: AI_and_IoT_Application_Platform
node.description: The project aims to design and implement an unified application platform that supports deployment of and interaction between applications, AI/ML models and IoT sensors/controllers. The platform will consist of multiple services which can be accessed by the users of different roles through an unified UI that communicates with the request manager service acting as a secured gateway over the other underlying services
